WorkPlace.Name: SKATEPRO ApS
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
SkatePro er en af Danmarks førende e-handelsvirksomheder - vinder af 5 e-handelspriser, kundeservice på 17 sprog, salg i 20+ lande, og en vækst fra 1 => 200+ ansatte på kun fjorten år.

Vi er et ungt og dynamisk team med medarbejdere fra det meste af Europa. Fælles for os alle er, at vi brænder for actionsport, e-commerce og at give kunden den gode oplevelse og den bedste support.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse employee for part-time shifts in SkatePro
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
In SkatePro we are now looking for a part-time employee for 8-hour shifts on Monday and Tuesday shifts with flexible work hours from 06:00 - 19:00, who can help us pick, pack and send orders to our customers all over the world. 

 

THE POSITION

We are a young and dynamic team, and due to busyness we need more colleagues in our Outbound part of the warehouse.

The job is a flexible part-time position with shifts on Mondays and Tuesdays with flexible hours from 06:00-19:00, and the tasks will primarily be picking and packing of orders. Other tasks such as receiving goods, filling up orders, ensuring tidiness and on-site placing of orders can also be a part of the job. 

We are a young and dynamic team, and we are making an effort doing a good job to make the work environment nice for yourself, your colleagues and not least for our customers.

 

PERSONAL AND PROFESSIONAL COMPETENCIES

  • You have a positive attitude, and you are a good team player 
  • You have a good overview and sense of order
  • You are in a good physical shape as the work can be demanding
  • You speak English, as we have many international colleagues
  • You must be able to present a criminal record 
  • Advantage if you have knowledge of our products and an interest in action sports
  • If you have a forklift license, it's a plus
  • If you have experience from a similar job and/or a logistics education, it's a plus 

 

WE OFFER

  • Good work spirit and a high mood 
  • A young dynamic team
  • Affordable lunch program, free coffee and tea during work hours
  • Pension Scheme, Health insurance 
  • Salary based on collective agreement between KA and Det Faglige Hus 

 

ABOUT SKATEPRO

SkatePro is a Danish action sports e-commerce company based just outside of Aarhus, Denmark, and we sell all kinds of equipment for skate, ski, BMX, surf and much more. Our mission is to ensure everybody who wants to explore the passion within action sport has the means to do so. We give honest advice, so our customer gets exactly what they need instead of, what we think sells best. The customer having a good time with our products is our main focus. At our office and warehouse in Søften north of Aarhus, our more than 200 employees work together every day to send action sports products to more than 30 countries.

 

PRACTICAL INFORMATION

  • Workhours: 16h/w Monday and Tuesday 
  • Contact: Permanent
  • Workplace: Omega 6, Søften, 8382 Hinnerup
  • Starting date: As soon as possible
  • Application deadline: We invite for interviews on an ongoing basis, so send your CV and application as soon as possible

 

If you find the position interesting, please send your application and CV (preferably in PDF format) to job@skatepro.com, and write "Warehouse employee part time" in the subject field. Please let us know what time you will be able to work on Mondays and Tuesdays between 06:00 - 19:00. 

Please enter your email address and phone number in your CV, so we can get in touch with you quickly.
